definitions.definition: A person of low general intelligence .
examples: Only an idiot would fail this exam.

definitions.definition: A person who makes stupid decisions; a fool .
examples: We think that people who cycle without a helmet are idiots .

definitions.definition: A person of the lowest intellectual standing, a person who lacks the capacity to develop beyond the mental age of a normal four-year-old; a person with an IQ below 30.

main_definition: ( derogatory ) A person of low general intelligence .
secondary_definitions: ( derogatory ) A person who makes stupid decisions; a fool .

( obsolete , medicine , psychology ) A person of the lowest intellectual standing, a person who lacks the capacity to develop beyond the mental age of a normal four-year-old; a person with an IQ below 30.
